biography_text: BUCSHON, Larry, a Representative from Indiana; born in Taylorville, Bartholomew County, Ill., May 31, 1962; B.S., University of Illinois, Urbana-Champaign, Ill., 1984; M.D., University of Illinois, Chicago, Ill., 1988; physician; United States Navy Reserve, 1989-1998; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Twelfth and to the three succeeding Congresses (January 3, 2011-present).
